item.title: Why the Mean is not Always the Best Measure: The Case of Bill Gates and the Average Persons Income
item.description: When it comes to understanding income distribution and comparing the financial wellbeing of different groups, it is common to use measures like the mean (or average) income.

item.title: Why Mean is actually good?
item.description: This my first post, so why not to pick the most basic topic?
